subject: Re: [junit] TestCase#setUp
msgSnippet: Oh...No... My setUp() method cleans up all the temporary directories so that the directories are clean during the test.  I cannot tell you how much I
messageBody:
Oh...No...

My setUp() method cleans up all the temporary directories so that the
directories are clean during the test. I cannot tell you how much I
appreciate that it is called automatically before every test.

If you want to do some one time setup, I think there were some posts
regarding that. Do a search in the archive and you should find what you
need.

Mike Duffy wrote:

> When a class is added to a test suite and that test suite is run, it
> seems strange to me that the method TestCase#setUp runs every time a
> test method runs. So if you have twenty test methods in a class and
> you add that class to a test suite, the method setUp runs twenty
> times.
>
> Shouldn't the method setUp be run just once for all the methods in a
> class? Is there some default setting that I missed?
>
